main.label: Explorer & Desktop
main.e4: Open The "This PC" Page in Explorer Instead of "Home"

status.hdInfo1: Choose The Drives You Want To Hide.

main.label: Windows Updates
main.wu2: Block Updates On a Specific Version of Windows
main.wu3: Disable Driver Installation via Windows Update
main.wu4: Disable Bloatware Reinstallation After a System Update

status.wu4: You Have Successfully Blocked Windows Update on a Specific Version.
status.wu5: You Can Always Go To The Windows Update Tab And Click *Resume Updates* At Any Time.

main.label: Remove UWP Apps
main.info1: Select The UWP apps you want to remove.
main.info2: Please note: These apps will not be removed for all users.
main.suredialogT3:
You should be aware that this application can no longer be restored to the system,
and work related to these components may not be correct.
main.suredialogT4: To continue, type ILOVEMAKUTWEAKER in the textbox, and click OK.

status.noapps: You have not selected any applications.
status.complete: UWP Applications Have Been Successfully Removed!

main.label: Shutdown Timer
main.info:
Enter The Number of Minutes
After Which The System Will Shutdown.
Press The *Shutdown* Button to Start The Timer You Set.
main.set: Launch This Page Instead of The Main

Use Checkboxes To Select The Settings
To Be Applied For Windows Quick Setup.

main.label: Windows Activation
main.step1:
Step 1: Select KMS server
(Try Another If Activation Fails!)

status.inprog: Activating... This may take a while on weak PCs.
status.alrd: The System has been Already Activated!
status.eval: You have the Evaluation Edition of Windows Installed, which cannot be activated. To activate Windows, you need to have a regular version of Windows.
status.nocon: You're not connected. Connect to the Internet to activate Windows
status.srv: The Server for Activation Was Selected Successfully!
status.edit: You Have Successfully Selected The System Edition For Activation!
status.error: Failed to activate Windows. Check the internet connection, and check if you have selected the right edition.
status.kmserr: KMS Server activation error, try another one and try again.
status.keyerr: You have selected the wrong edition. Select the correct one and try again.
status.hwerr: Windows cannot be activated using the HWID method. To activate Windows, use the Manual KMS Activation method.
status.offierr: Office cannot be activated using the Ohook method. Please reinstall Office and try again.

status.uacwarn: When the *Disable User Account Control (UAC)* option is enabled, Drag-and-Drop on the taskbar stops working in Windows 11. MakuTweaker is not related to this issue. Are you sure you want to continue?
